summary: End of Session 01 (Insaerndel): Battle-Born Arcana deal secured; Thalmor ledger routed to Irileth; Western Gate held; Thalmor Whiterun node neutralized; Guild foothold at 4/5
canonical_decisions: Battle-Born Arcana deal signed with Olfrid Battle-Born for 3,000g contract
Sealed Writ of Privilege received from House Battle-Born
Battle-Born evacuation route secured through Temple of Kyne
Thalmor ledger successfully routed to Commander Irileth via guard chain-of-command
Western Gate stabilized; Stormcloak assault elements neutralized
Thalmor handler and escorts eliminated behind Bannered Mare
Thalmor Whiterun intelligence node neutralized; evidence burned
Western parapet flank secured; Stormcloak sergeant and climbers eliminated
Compel 'No Witnesses' accepted for Thalmor elimination

scene_position.objective: Secure Imperial win in Battle of Whiterun; ensure Hadvar survives; trigger Greymane investigation fallout; protect Battle-Born Arcana foothold

commander_caius_whiterun_guard.note: Recognized Insaerndel; accepted ledger handoff via chain-of-command under siege conditions

inventory_added: Silver Ring of Authority (Thalmor handler token)

contracts_active.notes: Payment pending delivery after battle stabilization

guild_foothold_whiterun.note: One step from completion; Battle-Born deal and Imperial defense efforts

battleborn_quiet_inquiry.note: New clock tracking Battle-Born discrete operations

insaerndel_thalmor_search_clock.note: Minimal heat; evidence destroyed, witnesses eliminated

whiterun_alley_bodies_discovered.note: New clock; bodies not yet discovered

imperial_legion_trust.note: Ledger delivery and western gate defense earned trust

thalmor_manipulation_whiterun.note: New clock; Whiterun node neutralized via handler elimination and evidence burn

gm_notes.continuity: This patch represents a parallel campaign timeline with Insaerndel (Thieves Guild operative) during the Battle of Whiterun, distinct from Khagar Yal's Stormcloak campaign.
gm_notes.conflicts: If merging with Khagar campaign, note that: (1) Insaerndel works for Imperial/Battle-Born interests, (2) Whiterun control is 'imperial' here vs 'contested' in Khagar timeline, (3) Thalmor node status differs between campaigns
gm_notes.next_session: Battle aftermath; contract delivery to Olfrid; potential Greymane investigation complications; bodies behind Bannered Mare may be discovered
